query: Create the exec tool so the agent can run shell commands and capture their output
expected_behavior: The exec tool runs a simple command (e.g. echo hello) and returns stdout, stderr, and exitCode
The tool times out after the configured duration (default 5 minutes) and returns an error
Standard error output is captured in the stderr field, not mixed into stdout
Background execution mode (when supported) returns immediately with a process handle
The tool result is truncated at configured max length (default 20KB) if output is excessive
